meanings.definition: A device used in turbocharged and supercharged internal combustion engines to cool the air after it has been compressed.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic installed new intercoolers in the car engine.
meanings.sent2: The intercoolers improved the performance of the turbocharged engine.
meanings.sent3: The intercoolers decided to take a break from cooling the air and went on a vacation.
meanings.sent4: The intercoolers were like cool superheroes, rescuing the engine from overheating.
meanings.sent5: The shiny intercoolers gleamed under the hood, ready to chill the hot air.
